author: Kelly Dawson
title: 'It all feels a little off': Caution as post-virus China reopens
description: In Beijing, people struggling to resume 'normal' life amid continuing restrictions and their own fear of coronavirus.
content:
Beijing, China - Millie Yang had been self-quarantining at home in Beijing with her 11-year-old son for several weeks when the youngster begged to be taken to hospital. Ive got the virus, he said through tears. I cant breathe. 
His fear of COVID-19 had been … [+7619 chars]
